name: TOPCAT K1
notes:
Part of a family/brand of catamaran designs, the first of which was the F1, introduced in 1975. It is said the concept is based on the designers dissatisfaction with a trend towards complexity and fragility in many high performance 'off the beach' catamarans at the time. 
In 1985, this evolved into the faster and wider 18ft dual-trapeze "Spitfire" model, still being built, and upon which the K1 is based. (The 'Regatta' version features a 'flat top mainsail, and gennaker for offwind sailing). 
Recognized as an official ISAF racing class in 2005.
